ygData.subject: Re: Special foraged foods
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My druid never saw any of the special food until around 99 skill. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity. GAT d- -p+(--)
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Nov 10/99, Christine <christine@...> wrote:
> From: "Christine" <christine@...>
>
> I believe there is a skill-check involved in foraging the new special food
> (like crocodile eggs, mushrooms, sea salt, sylvian berries, glowing lich,
> etc), but I'm trying to figure out what it is.
>
> So I have a few questions:
>
> 1. Bards max at 40 foraging, right?
> 2. At what level do you usually reach 40 skill foraging?
> 3. Have any of you bards managed to forage something other than berries,
> fruit, rabbit meat, roots, veggies and water? And at what skill level did
> you get it?
>
> Anyone know about druids? (Like, if you have a druid, what is his skill cap
> and has he found any of the items, etc)

My druid never saw any of the special food until around 99 skill.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
GAT d- -p+(--) c++++ l++ u++ t- m--- W--- !v
b+++ e* s-/+ n-(?) h++ f+g+ w+++ y*
